message:
To MacBook people, from where can I buy a good Mini Display Port to VGA converter that doesn't cost 400 EGP? :D

Backstory: I have an MSI laptop that has both HDMI and Mini Display Port, and it happened twice so far that I need to connect to both an old projector (VGA) and a VR Headset (HDMI) and I had to borrow that converter, so now I need to buy my own just in case.
I've checked a few random stores, and they all had the same brandless one that costs from 150 to 250 EGP, I've tried 3 of these and they didn't work (or worked terribly) and had to return them. Then I checked at RadioShack and there was a "Hama" one that cost 400 EGP!

Are these prices reasonable?! :\

looks like something you can buy from China
i guess it's a i bought a display port -> HDMI adapter for about 200 LE . brandless  :D

try el bostan in tahrir or technology mall beside el serag mall , they have the best prices , however Souq el Asr is usually more expensive but I usually go for it as it is not worth the savings to go to tahrir or nasr city

By the way the one that costs EGP 400 is not that good as you can think, it is just overpriced due to the EGP devaluation, I was at RadioShack last week checking for a car phone charger, they are starting from EGP 300!!

I don't have much hardware knowledge, but looking at these convereters, they are just interface converters made in china with a small chip inside, sometimes, do you guys really think there is a major difference at least on the ones doing just basic interface conversion?
Mawgod fe mall el bostan fe el door el talet b 135 gneh. The exact same product elly fe Radioshack b 270 gneh ðŸ˜ƒ
